Text: Vacation Sick Leave Balances Year LNotesnsf Greetings Everyone You may have noticed that your paycheck stubs reflect vacation and sick leave balances that are inaccurate Due to EWC being acquired mid calendar year and GE grandfathering in our vacation levels the balances as stated on your check stub will differ from your actual balances So for the balance of this calendar year all vacation and sick time balances will be tracked locally on our own HRIS System at GE Wind in Tehachapi Human Resources will provide you with your true balances by the following method The first of every month Human Resources will print out a hard copy of your vacation and sick leave balances Employees located in the North and South Tehachapi facilities will be able to pick up a hard copy of their balances from their respective facility receptionists Remote site employees balances will be mailed to the respective Site Supervisors for distribution Thank you for your continued understanding through the integration process

URGENT Disability Ballot LNotesnsf This message is for all employees in California and New York For all who have submitted their disability ballots thank you There are still a few of you who have not returned your ballot to elect either the State Disability program or the GE Disability program Do not call HR and ask if you are one who did not submit a ballot If you are unsure whether or not you submitted a ballot chances are you did not We need your ballot immediately This issue is now critical Please submit by end of business Wednesday July th For your convenience a ballot is attached
Medical ID Cards LNotesnsf Greetings If you have not received your GE group health medical identification cards you may call the following number to request cards again

ABRA HRIS System LNotesnsf This message is for all ABRA users Due to the IT conversion ABRA will be unavailable Friday July th through Sunday July th ABRA will be back up and available Monday July th We appreciate your understanding during this transitional phase
